amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for NASA's Advanced Subsonic Aeronautic Research Program by $34.4 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 19 in the Congressional Record of May 8, 1996 to increase the funds authorized in the bill for NASA's Advanced Subsonics aeronautics research program by $34 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 250 (Roll no. 204).
